about_the_game:
Welcome to Tapple

Tapple is a clicker game where your tapping skills can lead you to an unimaginable amount of Tapples! While it’s a simple game, I’m continuously adding more features as I learn. Start your journey with a single click and watch your Tapple Empire grow.

Key Features:


Easy to Start: Just tap to begin your journey to riches.
Tapple Upgrades: Enhance your clicking power with special upgrade Tapples.
Automation: Automate your income to keep the Tapples flowing even when you're AFK.
Level Progression: Unlock 10 levels, from modest beginnings to earning billions and trillions of Tapples.
Hidden Secrets: Discover bonuses and hidden achievements as you advance.
detailed_description:
Welcome to Tapple

Tapple is a clicker game where your tapping skills can lead you to an unimaginable amount of Tapples! While it’s a simple game, I’m continuously adding more features as I learn. Start your journey with a single click and watch your Tapple Empire grow.

Key Features:


Easy to Start: Just tap to begin your journey to riches.
Tapple Upgrades: Enhance your clicking power with special upgrade Tapples.
Automation: Automate your income to keep the Tapples flowing even when you're AFK.
Level Progression: Unlock 10 levels, from modest beginnings to earning billions and trillions of Tapples.
Hidden Secrets: Discover bonuses and hidden achievements as you advance.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+, SteamOS
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card with OpenGL support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard audio
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Latest supported versions
  • Processor: Quad-core CPU or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with DirectX 11 / OpenGL support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card / Standard audio

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard audio
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Latest supported versions
  • Processor: Quad-core CPU or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with DirectX 11 / OpenGL support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card / Standard audio

name: Tapple - Idle Clicker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+, 8, 10, 64-bit versions only
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card with DirectX 11 support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Quad-core CPU or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with DirectX 11 / OpenGL support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card / Standard audio

short_description: Welcome to Tapple, the idle clicker game where every tap brings you closer to an ever-growing collection of Tapples. Build your empire one tap at a time, discover unique Tapple drops, and experience the rewarding gameplay that keeps you coming back for more.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*
*languages with full audio support
